item.title: Choosing the right tool for blogging
item.description: In the peak pandemic, I needed something to pass my time, so decided to create a blog site. g I initially thought of handcrafting myself with the ReactJs as I though this will be a learning for me but soon realized it’s going to be not easy as I don’t like CSS that much. Though I had a bit of experience working with react I don’t consider myself as an expert UI developer.
